name: iphone x
description: The mobile is compact with its 6.2-inch OLED screen and far lighter at 168g. It perfectly captures the design, looks, and feel of the expensive one. It comes with a snapdragon processor with a 5n chip in it. It has a 200mp camera in the rear 100mp in front perfect for selfie lovers. It also support HDR content means you can watch 4K content on it.

name: Laptop
description: This powerful laptop is designed for productivity and entertainment. With its Intel i7 processor and dedicated graphics card, it can handle any task with ease. The sleek design and vibrant display make it perfect for both work and play.

name: Smartphone
description: Experience the latest technology with this flagship smartphone. Its high-resolution display and powerful processor ensure smooth performance. With a stunning camera setup, you can capture every moment in detail.

name: Headphones
description: Immerse yourself in music with these high-quality headphones. With noise-cancellation technology and comfortable ear cups, you can enjoy your favorite tunes for hours without any distractions.

name: Camera
description: Capture life's precious moments with this high-performance camera. Equipped with a large sensor and advanced autofocus system, it delivers stunning images even in low light conditions. With 4K video recording capabilities, you can create cinematic masterpieces.

name: Smart Watch
description: Stay connected and organized with this sleek smartwatch. With its intuitive interface and comprehensive health tracking features, it's the perfect companion for your active lifestyle. Receive notifications, track your workouts, and monitor your heart rate with ease.

name: Speaker
description: Bring the party wherever you go with this portable speaker. With its compact design and powerful sound, it's perfect for outdoor gatherings or indoor listening sessions. Connect wirelessly to your devices and enjoy your favorite playlists with crystal-clear audio.

name: Television
description: Transform your entertainment experience with this high-definition television. Featuring a stunning display and immersive sound, it brings your favorite movies and shows to life. With smart capabilities, you can access streaming services and browse the web with ease.

name: Gaming Console
description: Experience the next level of gaming with this powerful console. With its cutting-edge graphics and lightning-fast processing, it delivers an immersive gaming experience like no other. Whether you're playing solo or competing online, you'll enjoy every moment.

name: Tablet
description: Stay productive on the go with this versatile tablet. With its large screen and powerful processor, it's perfect for multitasking and entertainment. Whether you're watching movies, browsing the web, or sketching ideas, this tablet has you covered.

name: Fitness Tracker
description: Track your fitness goals with this stylish tracker. With its built-in sensors and intuitive app, it monitors your activity levels, heart rate, and sleep patterns. Set goals, receive insights, and stay motivated on your journey to a healthier lifestyle.

name: Wireless Mouse
description: Experience freedom and convenience with this ergonomic wireless mouse. With its precision tracking and comfortable design, it's perfect for long hours of work or gaming. Simply plug in the USB receiver and start using it wirelessly.

name: External Hard Drive
description: Expand your storage capacity with this reliable external hard drive. With its high-speed USB interface and large capacity, it's perfect for backing up your files or storing multimedia content. Simply plug it in and transfer data with ease.

name: Smart Bulb
description: Illuminate your home with this energy-efficient smart bulb. With its adjustable brightness and color options, you can create the perfect ambiance for any occasion. Control it remotely using your smartphone or voice commands for added convenience.

name: Wireless Earbuds
description: Enjoy your favorite music on the go with these sleek wireless earbuds. With their snug fit and clear sound quality, they provide an immersive listening experience. The compact charging case ensures long-lasting battery life, so you can listen all day.

name: Monitor
description: Enhance your productivity with this high-resolution monitor. With its large screen and sharp display, it's perfect for multitasking and creative work. Whether you're editing photos, designing graphics, or watching videos, you'll love the clarity and detail.

name: Wireless Keyboard
description: Enjoy the freedom of wireless typing with this sleek keyboard. With its responsive keys and ergonomic design, it provides a comfortable typing experience for long hours. The compact layout and multimedia shortcuts make it perfect for both work and play.

name: Wireless Router
description: Stay connected with this high-speed wireless router. With its advanced features and strong signal strength, it provides reliable internet access for your home or office. Set up parental controls, prioritize devices, and manage your network with ease.

name: Wireless Charger
description: Charge your devices with ease using this convenient wireless charger. Simply place your smartphone or other Qi-compatible device on the charging pad and watch it power up quickly. The sleek design and compact size make it perfect for home or travel.

stars.name: Vivobook 15

Everything about Vivobook 15 is bold and improved, from its powerful 13th Gen Intel® Core™ processor to its crisp and clear display, 180° lay-flat hinge, modern colors and sleek geometric design. Make a fresh start today with Vivobook 15
